entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 04:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

Visibility: 2.4 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Light snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
